ygData.subject: RE: Where EQ wanna go tomorrow?
ygData.msgSnippet:
So does it mean once I get ROO, I can kill the npc liao? (wiz no need to go 
OOT to buy scrolls right?).  Btw, anyone try swiming to OOT b4?  During 
newbie
ygData.messageBody:
So does it mean once I get ROO, I can kill the npc liao? (wiz no need to go
OOT to buy scrolls right?). Btw, anyone try swiming to OOT b4? During
newbie time I once crash on boat and fall into OOT, swim to an isle and
gate back to GF. I'm thinking maybe now it's time I can swim to OOT, if I
happened to kill that npc too much, hehe.
I have not travel by boating since lvl 20 liao, hehe....
Btw wat's the lvl of that npc? I heard it wont affect ya faction with
dwarf city, true?
U are a druid right? Can teleport anywhere other then OOT (swim lor).

Come to think it, Fes and I used to be so concern abt factions with good
npc, in the end we also killed until KOS by treants. Compared with those
kakis who hunt whole day in HH pass, it's very hard to reject the
temptation to kill treants, hehe.

Ziltus

On Thursday, 23 September, 1999 3:32 PM, Lim Choong Ee
[SMTP:choongee@...] wrote:
>
>
> From: Lim Choong Ee <choongee@...>
>
> yes the dwarf npc good to kill n great loot :p
> i once though so too until a point i realised something
> n i stop :p u r a wizard u can kill of coz, i'm not
> ...u see the little dwarf female by the port where people needed to wait
> for boat?
> kill enough of te dwarf n u never get to boat ride again in bucher:p
>
> From: Lim Choong Ee <choongee@...>
>
> one thing, there no way to riase the faction with
> this npc dwarf as at moment :p
> think twice if u wanna travel to oot via butcher to get
> roo :p
>
>
> At 03:22 PM 9/23/99 +0800, you wrote:
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >Finally I found some very good spots to hunt and lvling again, killing
> >guards. No, not killing evil guards, their spawns sux like hell.
> > Wandering Nek forest one of the nights with FF, Fes and Feb, only
whimpy
> >guards, no dragoons.
> >
> >Today I read tat at lvl 30-35, it's best to kill good guards, LOL. See
> >those dwarf npc merchant in Buthcerblock? KILL THEM! See the fisherman
in
> >the port? KILL THEM!!! They dropped 2H axe tat can be sold for 22pp.
> > Pple just need to hunt 10 days and they get 10,000pp! Talk abt
faction,
> >who care? Verant make it such that killing these npcs will not affect
> >faction of similar race npc in elsewhere (eg u kill dawrf at dock but
wont
> >get KOS in dwarf city).
> >
> >One of the main attractions tat EQ used to attract me is alighnment
policy,
> >just like my good old D&D games. Now the faction thingy is so broken
that
> >we have to follow everyone to kill good races npc. Sigh, at least
killing
> >innocent npc in UO DOES give a REAL faction (so call karma and title
hit)
> >hit.
> >
> >What? U insist not to follow the rest to kill good races npc? Ah, then
get
> >prepared to kena KS by those powerlvl gamers...Where else can casters
solo
> >hunting and lvling? Yes...those 1-3 mob camps...now ya choice widen
with
> >solo guards hunting. Yes, Verant think Yield Rule will fail (I'm one of
> >those who say I WILL NOT YIELD! BAN ME MF!!!)..so they make more guards
> >for all to kill/lvl.
> >
> >What? Not enuff guards to kill? Try gnome guards, EK guards, Qeynos
guard
> >or even Halas guard if you dun wanan enter tat cold freezing city..hehe.
> >
> >Maybe when Ziltus reach lvl 50, it's time to leave EQ... ;P
> >
> >And no, after UO and EQ, I will TRY not to touch any long-term online
RPG.
> > I guess I will only try those session RPG like Winternight (Baldur's
Gate
> >interface, AD&D rules) and Diablo 2 (Diablo kick ass, I have faith in
> >Diablo 2). Sometime I wonder, how to cope up with more than 1 online
RPG
> >like UO and EQ? Sad to say when EQ server down these 2 weeks, I login UO
> >and find UO really DOES have more role-playing elements than EQ. At
least
> >when I dun feel like sticking my backside on the treant hill for 5 hrs
in a
> >row, I dun have to do the same in UO. I login my miner and mine some
ores,
> >make some tinkering items (jeeze I havent make any of the cool new
> >tinkering stuffs since the patch) and branded weap (my craftman is GM
smith
> >& tinker)...and I spend 20 min or so to make some furniture to
redecorate
> >the rooms I used to trap polar bear for sparring (all deleted by GM, my
> >craftman also master lumberjack and carpenter)...boy I start to miss UO
> >after 4 mths of playing EQ, hehe....
> >
> >Talk abt AC, I really very scare to go in...hehe.
> >
> >Ziltus
